title: Sacky boy vs Gorilla
body: The gorilla is an evolved version of sacky boy

replies.body: nothing beats the original, so I vote iNoob.

> [{quoted}](name=BuzDBumblebee,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=U02OMWTG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-24T15:04:34.230+0000)
>
> nothing beats the original, so I vote iNoob.

Since when is iNoob original? He rips everything he says from the old GD. So does sackboy. People were doing what they are doing now, ages ago.

> [{quoted}](name=oops,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=U02OMWTG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-24T15:43:37.797+0000)
>
> Since when is iNoob original? He rips everything he says from the old GD. So does sackboy. People were doing what they are doing now, ages ago.

How can you say that when I was in GD before you? I was a renown GD troll on the NA forums, as soon as OCE's GD opened I did the same.
I honestly cannot believe my legacy died on OCE.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=U02OMWTG,comment-id=000000000001,timestamp=2015-04-25T07:45:33.544+0000)
>
> How can you say that when I was in GD before you? I was a renown GD troll on the NA forums, as soon as OCE's GD opened I did the same.
> I honestly cannot believe my legacy died on OCE.

I never saw you on NA GD when I was there 4 years ago, never saw you on OCE GD either.

> [{quoted}](name=oops,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=U02OMWTG,comment-id=0000000000010000,timestamp=2015-04-25T11:59:47.635+0000)
>
> I never saw you on NA GD when I was there 4 years ago, never saw you on OCE GD either.

I have more than one account, I was forum banned more times than I would like to admit.
I lost count at around 16.
yeh ur right hes not original but he created the post, so i vote iNoob nonetheless
this post s is shit you should feel shit because you are shit
If you get banned so often, what does that tell you?

> [{quoted}](name=oops,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=U02OMWTG,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-04-25T12:21:15.985+0000)
>
> If you get banned so often, what does that tell you?

That I'm a successful troll and that you have no idea how the boards work.

> [{quoted}](name=Sackboy,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=U02OMWTG,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2015-04-25T12:32:57.283+0000)
>
> That I'm a successful troll and that you have no idea how the boards work.

A successful troll would never get banned. A successful troll would never call themselves a successful troll either. You aren't special, you aren't unique, you are the same as every other 14 year old with an internet connection.
